import React from 'react' import Rating from '../components/rating' import data from '../data' function Productscreen(props) { const product =data.products.find(x=>x._id===props.match.params.id); if(!product) { return
product Not Found
} return (

  • {product.name}

  • PRICE:${product.price}
  • DESCRIPTION:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
) } export default Productscreen
